title: Netflix beats on earnings, but shares dip as the streamer's forecast for Q1 falls short of Wall Street expectations
full_text: Netflix beats on earnings, but shares dip as the streamer's forecast for Q1 falls short of Wall Street expectations. Netflix reported fourth-quarter results that were slightly above estimates, but shares fell over 4% in after-hours trading.. Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos' company reported a solid quarter, but investors don't seem impressed.Jemal Countess/Getty Images <ul><li>Netflix reported fourth-quarter results that were slightly above… [+2899 chars]
